directions: In a large bowl, whisk together the sweetened condensed milk and hazelnut spread until well blended. Gradually whisk in the vanilla, evaporated milk, cream, half-and-half and Irish whiskey. Pour into containers and store in the refrigerator for at least 1 day before serving. Shake or stir before serving.
ingredients: 2 (14 ounce) cans can sweetened condensed milk (save the can)
title: Hazelnut Irish Cream
